name: Fireball
description: A blazing sphere of fire that explodes on impact, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.

name: Healing Light
description: A warm light that heals the wounds of allies, restoring health over time.

name: Ice Shard
description: A sharp shard of ice that pierces through enemies, slowing their movement.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A bolt of lightning that strikes a single target, dealing high damage and stunning them.

name: Shield
description: A protective barrier that absorbs damage for a short duration.
